item.title: Starbucks CEO sets new time goal for baristas making your order
item.description: Starbucks CEO sets a new service goal for baristas in order to improve in-store experience for customers, changes happen at stores across the U.S.

item.title: FDA may revoke Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine authorization for kids under certain age
item.description: The Food and Drug Administration could pull Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine emergency authorization for children under age 5.
